# âš¡ ONE COMMAND TO RELEASE v0.2.0

**Copy and paste this into your terminal:**

```bash
cd /home/ob/Development/Tools/chroma && git tag -a v0.2.0 -m "Release v0.2.0 - Production Ready" && git push origin v0.2.0
```

**That's it!**

GitHub Actions will automatically publish to PyPI in 2-3 minutes.

---

## Then Verify (After ~3 minutes)

Visit: https://pypi.org/project/chroma-ingestion/

You should see v0.2.0 available! ðŸŽ‰
